title: Rock N Roll Suicide
description: The music business has been a frustration machine since Elvis started gyrating his hips and Jagger got licking his lips; stirring the emotions of fans into a frenzy, creating icons for the young to live and die by. Max is one such icon. At closer to seven feet than six, Max is a big rock star in more ways than one. When he goes missing at the end of an exhaustive forty-date tour, it is presumed the nineteen-year-old has committed suicide. Only one person knows the she's his biggest fan, and she's not telling.
author: P.-P. Hartnett
